markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Xulgath Skirmisher](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2104)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 24

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 22

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 19
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 6">[Xulgath Skirmisher](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2104)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
<trait label="Xulgath" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=244" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #153: Life's Long Shadows](/Sources.aspx?ID=29) pg. 27</row>

**Perception** +15; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2), [Undercommon](/Languages.aspx?ID=11)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +16, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +14, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +16, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +15

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +4

**Con** +1

**Int** +0

**Wis** +3

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Items**
[javelins](/Weapons.aspx?ID=71) (6), [Scimitar](/Weapons.aspx?ID=38), [Studded Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=5)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 24 

**Fort** +13 

**Ref** +16 

**Will** +13 

</row>

**HP** 95

**Powerful Stench** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206), [olfactory](/Traits.aspx?ID=246)) 30 feet. A creature that enters the area must attempt a DC 23 Fortitude save. On a failure, the creature is [sickened 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34), and on a critical failure, the creature is also [slowed 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=35) for as long as it is sickened. While within the aura, the creature takes a –2 circumstance penalty to saves to recover from the sickened condition. A creature that succeeds at its save is temporarily immune to all xulgaths' stenches for 1 minute.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet, light step

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
scimitar +16 ([Forceful](/Traits.aspx?ID=180), [Sweep](/Traits.aspx?ID=194)),
**Damage** 1d6+4 slashing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +16,
**Damage** 1d6+4 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
claw +16 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 1d4+4 slashing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
javelin +16 ([thrown 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)),
**Damage** 1d6+4 piercing damage

**Light Step**   When a skirmisher Strides or Steps, they ignore difficult terrain and treat greater difficult terrain as difficult terrain.

**Powerful Arm**   The xulgath skirmisher doubles the range increment of its thrown weapons.

**Skirmishing Movement** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Attack](/Traits.aspx?ID=15), [Move](/Traits.aspx?ID=114)) The xulgath skirmisher Strides or Steps, then Strikes. This Strike deals an additional 3d6 precision damage.

</column>
name: Xulgath Skirmisher

text: Xulgath Skirmisher Recall Knowledge - Humanoid (Society): DC 24 Unspecific Lore : DC 22 Specific Lore : DC 19 Xulgath Skirmisher Source Pathfinder #153: Life's Long Shadows pg. 27 Perception +15; darkvision Languages Draconic, Undercommon Skills Acrobatics +16, Athletics +14, Stealth +16, Survival +15 Str +4 Dex +4 Con +1 Int +0 Wis +3 Cha +0 Items javelins (6), Scimitar, Studded Leather Armor --- AC 24 Fort +13 Ref +16 Will +13 HP 95 Powerful Stench (aura, olfactory) 30 feet. A creature that enters the area must attempt a DC 23 Fortitude save. On a failure, the creature is sickened 2, and on a critical failure, the creature is also slowed 1 for as long as it is sickened. While within the aura, the creature takes a –2 circumstance penalty to saves to recover from the sickened condition. A creature that succeeds at its save is temporarily immune to all xulgaths' stenches for 1 minute. --- Speed 30 feet, light step Melee Single Action scimitar +16 (Forceful, Sweep), Damage 1d6+4 slashing Melee Single Action jaws +16, Damage 1d6+4 piercing Melee Single Action claw +16 (Agile, Finesse), Damage 1d4+4 slashing Ranged Single Action javelin +16 (thrown 60 feet), Damage 1d6+4 piercing damage Light Step When a skirmisher Strides or Steps, they ignore difficult terrain and treat greater difficult terrain as difficult terrain. Powerful Arm The xulgath skirmisher doubles the range increment of its thrown weapons. Skirmishing Movement Two Actions (Attack, Move) The xulgath skirmisher Strides or Steps, then Strikes. This Strike deals an additional 3d6 precision damage.
